text: Terestrombus fragilis, common name : the Fragile Conch, is a species of sea snail, a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Strombidae, the true conchs. ==Description== The shell size varies between 25 mm and 53 mm. ==Distribution== This species is distributed in the western and central part of the Pacific Ocean and along the Philippines. ==References== ==External links== * Category:Strombidae Category:Gastropods described in 1798
title: Terestrombus fragilis
